Tomorrow, the House will be passing legislation to reopen federal agencies. 

Senate should pass it - and send to the President.  And, he should sign it. Enough with the #TrumpShutdown

By 2 to 1 margins, Americans oppose adding funding for @realDonaldTrump's ineffective, morally offensive wall. 

The White House needs to stop the political posturing, negotiate with Democrats and get to work reopening the federal government.

2018 was an eventful year and very busy working on behalf of New York working families, seniors and all our neighbors. While I'm disappointed the year ended in the #Trumpshutdown, I look forward to getting to work in 2019 starting with passing legislation to reopen the government
Happy New Year. Sending best wishes for a peaceful New Year for all!
